identificationModule.briefTitle: Effect of Simple Simulator-based Training on Initial Performance of Novices Iultrasound-guided Adductor Canal Block
identificationModule.officialTitle: Effect of Simple Simulator-based Training on Initial Performance of Novices in Ultrasound-guided Adductor Canal Block

descriptionModule.briefSummary: This prospective descriptive study is effect of simple simulator-based training on initial performance of novices in ultrasound-guided adductor canal block. The main question is Can we improve performance on simple simultor-based training ultrasound-guide adductor canal block?. We evaluate in First-year residents in Anesthesiology, Faculty of medicine, PSU.

primaryOutcomes.measure: The efficiency of using a simple model for injecting local anesthesia through the adductor canal under ultrasound guidance assessed by Design and Validation Regional Anaesthesia Procedural skill Assessment tool
primaryOutcomes.description: To study the efficiency of using a simple model for injecting local anesthesia through the adductor canal under ultrasound by 1st year anesthesia residentassessed by Design and Validation Regional Anaesthesia Procedural skill Assessment tool

secondaryOutcomes.measure: satisfaction and confidence in teaching assessed by pre- and post-test, satisfaction questions
secondaryOutcomes.description: To study satisfaction and confidence in teaching by using a simple simulator for injecting regional anesthesia through the adductor canal under ultrasound guidance by anesthesiology resident with no prior experience assessed by pre- and post-test, satisfaction question

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* First-year anesthesiology residents in faculty of medicine, PSU

Exclusion Criteria:

* Residents with previous experience in ultrasound-guide adductor canal block
eligibilityModule.studyPopulation: we choose First-year anesthesiology residents in faculty of medicine, PSU

overallOfficials.name: Teerawat Krongyut
overallOfficials.affiliation: Department of Anesthesiology, Faculty of Medicine, Prince of Songkla University

locations.facility: Department of Anesthesiology, Faculty of Medicine, Prince of Songkla University
